subject: Real Estate
title: Amazon HQ2: The City Auction
description: A short lesson to help you apply Amazon HQ2: The City Auction.

hook.text: In 2017, Amazon invited 238 cities to compete for its second headquarters. The bidding war was extraordinary.

buildup.text: Cities offered billions in tax breaks, free land, and even renaming opportunities to lure Amazon.

discovery.text: Amazon chose Crystal City, Virginia â€” close to Washington power and Jeff Bezos's personal home.

twist.text: New York was also selected but withdrew after local opposition to $3 billion in tax incentives.

climax.text: HQ2 revealed how much power one company has over city governments desperate for jobs and tax revenue.

punchline.text: 238 cities begged. Amazon picked the one near Bezos's house.

quiz.question: Why did Amazon's New York HQ2 plan fall through?
